description: About Acavefox Acavefox is always devoting to making quality products with high performance, dedicated to developing outstanding options to meet the needs of diverse individuals. Our eyewear is widely available and affordably priced. Your satisfaction is our priority. Acavefox readers are exactly what you had been looking for! Buying acavefox eyeglasses, you could not only receive quality products but also great shopping experience. Elevate your reading experience today! FEATURES AND BENEFITS ✓ More Comprehensive Defense:anti-glare; blocking 100% harmful blue light and UV400 rays; you can enjoy daily wear and better sleep. ✓ Accurate magnification, high transmittance, low color difference, clearer and lighter than conventional lenses. ✓ More Fashionable And Comfortable:solid frames, rust-free metal spring hinges and screws, two-tone colors, the unique design, delicate enough to be stylish. Size: Frame width: 139mm/ 5.47" (approx.) Lens Height: 37mm/ 1.46 " (approx.) Lens Width : 54mm/2.12 " (approx.) Bridge:18mm/ 0.7 "(approx.) Leg Length :140mm/5.51 " (approx.) Acavefox flexible spring box adds a smooth and stylish touch; The temple opens up to 145, accommodating various face shapes, enjoy your best reading experience. Note: It is a size used for manual measurement and may have an error of 0 to 2mm, which is normal.Please refer to the actual size. HOW TO CARE It shall be cleaned at least once every 2-3 days, as follows: 1. First use water (do not use hot water, so as not to damage the lens coating layer) to wash the dust on the lens surface, to prevent the small particles on the lens due to friction and wear on the lens, directly flush, do not use the hand friction; 2. On the premise of ensuring water on the lens, apply detergent (neutral) gently and evenly on both sides of the lens to let the surface oil decompose; 3. Rinse it with clean water until the lens is clean; 4. Turn the water of the faucet into a DC state without splashing, and use the water to take away the water drops on the lens; 5. If there is still a small amount of water, can use mirror cloth, clean cotton cloth, glasses paper dry, do not wipe, any wipe will accidentally leave traces.
